general_info.summary: This text lists various academic programs, schools, reports, and initiatives at Sharda University, including the School of Dental Sciences, School of Medical Sciences & Research, and Sharda School of Nursing Science & Research. It also highlights administrative and student support services such as Banking And Postal Services, Family & Couple Counselling Services, and capacity development initiatives like Sharda Skills and career counseling. The document further mentions university publications, leadership, history, statutory bodies, tenders, and specific programs like the Academic Bank of Credits and FM Radio Suno Sharda-90.8FM, alongside links to various Sharda University campuses and important portals.
